original: @339b rgya gar fskad du; badzra s'ukshma aa pra ti ha ta n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /🔽bod skad du /
analyzed: @339b rgya gar fskad du; badzra s'ukshma aa pra ti ha ta n'a ma dh'a ra n'i / bod skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit: Vajra-sūkṣma-apratihata-nāma-dhāraṇī

original: rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
translated: In Tibetan: rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: bde gshegs khro bo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bde gshegs khro bo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Sugatas and Wrathful Ones.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: The Blessed One entered the vajra reasoning samadhi.

original: sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje h'um zhes bya bas bzhin rab tu 'bar ba bstan te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje h'um zhes bya bas bzhin rab tu 'bar ba bstan te /
translated: By the power of the Buddha, Guhyapati Vajrapāṇi, with a blazing face, uttered hum

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'dug go /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'dug go /
translated: and sat in the presence of the Blessed One.

original: de'i tshe @340a *//
analyzed: de'i tshe @340a *//
translated: At that time,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las bram ze'i khye'u cig byung ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las bram ze'i khye'u cig byung ste /
translated: from the emanation of the Blessed One's mind, a young brahmin appeared

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: and said this to Guhyapati:

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
translated: Guhyapati,

original: rig pa'i bdag po /
analyzed: rig pa'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Knowledge,

original: gzungs kyi bdag po /
analyzed: gzungs kyi bdag po /
translated: Lord of Dhāraṇīs,

original: lha'i gnas gsum po dag na lha nyam chung ba dang / klu nyam chung ba la zil gyis gnon pa drag pos rab tu gzhom pa'i gsang sngags dang / rig sngags gzungs sngags rnams rab tu brjod du gsol /
analyzed: lha'i gnas gsum po dag na lha nyam chung ba dang / klu nyam chung ba la zil gyis gnon pa drag pos rab tu gzhom pa'i gsang sngags dang / rig sngags gzungs sngags rnams rab tu brjod du gsol /
translated: please proclaim the secret mantras, knowledge mantras, and dhāraṇī mantras that can subdue with fierce power the weak gods and nāgas in the three celestial abodes.

original: lag na rdo rjes smras pa /
analyzed: lag na rdo rjes smras pa /
translated: Vajrapāṇi said,

original: bram ze'i khye'u rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / nga yis bde gshegs khro bo thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang snying 'di rab tu smras so //🔽na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
analyzed: bram ze'i khye'u rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / nga yis bde gshegs khro bo thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang snying 'di rab tu smras so // na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
translated: Listen well, young brahmin, and keep this in mind. I will now proclaim this essence that is always recited by all the wrathful Sugatas.🔽Namo ratnatrayāya.

original: na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
analyzed: na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
translated: Namo caṇḍavajrapāṇaye.

original: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
analyzed: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
translated: Mahāyakṣasenāpataye.

original: tadya th'a / aom ha ra ha ra badzra /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom ha ra ha ra badzra /
translated: Tadyathā. Oṃ hara hara vajra.

original: ma tha ma tha badzra /🔽dhu na dhu na badzra /
analyzed: ma tha ma tha badzra / dhu na dhu na badzra /
translated: Mathana mathana vajra.🔽Dhūna dhūna vajra.

original: da ha da ha badzra /
analyzed: da ha da ha badzra /
translated: Dhaha dhaha vajra.

original: pa tsa pa tsa badzra /🔽dha ra dha ra badzra /
analyzed: pa tsa pa tsa badzra / dha ra dha ra badzra /
translated: Pacana pacana vajra.🔽Dhāra dhāra vajra.

original: d'a ra ya d'a ra ya badzra /🔽d'a ru na d'a ru na badzra /
analyzed: d'a ra ya d'a ra ya badzra / d'a ru na d'a ru na badzra /
translated: Dāraya dāraya vajra.🔽Dāruna dāruna vajra.

original: tstshinda tstshinda badzra /
analyzed: tstshinda tstshinda badzra /
translated: Cchinda cchinda vajra.

original: bhinda bhinda badzra /
analyzed: bhinda bhinda badzra /
translated: Bind bind vajra.

original: h'um phat th'a /
analyzed: h'um phat th'a /
translated: Hum phat tha.

original: na mashtsanda badzra kro dh'a ya /
analyzed: na mashtsanda badzra kro dh'a ya /
translated: Namah shashan vajra krodhaya.

original: hu lu hu lu /
analyzed: hu lu hu lu /
translated: Hula hula.🔽Tishta tishta.

original: tishtha tishtha / bandha bandha /
analyzed: tishtha tishtha / bandha bandha /
translated: Bhandha bhandha.

original: ha na ha na /
analyzed: ha na ha na /
translated: Hana hana.

original: aa mri te h'um phat th'a /
analyzed: aa mri te h'um phat th'a /
translated: Amrita hum phat tha.

original: bram ze'i khye'u gang la la zhag gis bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i cha bzung ste //
analyzed: bram ze'i khye'u gang la la zhag gis bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i cha bzung ste //
translated: To any young brahmin who takes up the aspect of Sugata Amritakundali,

original: khro bo thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu smra zhing /
analyzed: khro bo thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu smra zhing /
translated: he will utter these vajra words of all the wrathful ones,

original: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rdo rje phra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyogs bcur spros na /
analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rdo rje phra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyogs bcur spros na /
translated: and emanate countless subtle vajras from all his pores, which he will emanate into the ten directions.

original: sems can @340b thams cad kyi bag chags ngan pa byang /
analyzed: sems can @340b thams cad kyi bag chags ngan pa byang /
translated: If he does this, the negative habitual tendencies of all sentient beings will be purified,

original: tshe dang bsod nams rab tu rgyas te /
analyzed: tshe dang bsod nams rab tu rgyas te /
translated: their lifespan and merit will greatly increase,

original: dgra dang / dug dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par thar nas /🔽gang zhig gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa la rtsi ma gi ta sprin gyis bshig pa'am /
analyzed: dgra dang / dug dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par thar nas / gang zhig gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa la rtsi ma gi ta sprin gyis bshig pa'am /
translated: and they will be liberated from enemies, poison, and untimely death.🔽If he visualizes the bad obstructing forces and destroys them with the cloud of resin,

original: skyu ru ra rlon pa gser gyis gzhibs pa bzhin du dmigs te /
analyzed: skyu ru ra rlon pa gser gyis gzhibs pa bzhin du dmigs te /
translated: or visualizes a fresh myrobalan plum wrapped in gold,

original: rdo rje'i tshig 'di smra zhing /
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig 'di smra zhing /
translated: Speaking these vajra words,

original: rdo rje phra mo spros pas de dag gi phung po lnga dbang po lnga myur du brlag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo spros pas de dag gi phung po lnga dbang po lnga myur du brlag par 'gyur ro //
translated: and emanating the subtle vajra, their five aggregates and five sense faculties will quickly be destroyed.

original: lhas smras na lha'i zla ba gcig gam /
analyzed: lhas smras na lha'i zla ba gcig gam /
translated: If a god speaks them, in one month of the gods

original: lo lnga na lha ma yin mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lo lnga na lha ma yin mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro //
translated: or five years, the asura will have his head split open.

original: dge slong gis smras na /
analyzed: dge slong gis smras na /
translated: If a bhikṣu speaks them,

original: bdud kyi mtshon cha rnams myur du btul bar 'gyur ro //🔽mis brjod na gang la dmigs pa de mi'i zla ba gcig gam /
analyzed: bdud kyi mtshon cha rnams myur du btul bar 'gyur ro // mis brjod na gang la dmigs pa de mi'i zla ba gcig gam /
translated: he will quickly subdue the weapons of Māra.🔽If a human speaks them, whoever is targeted will be destroyed in one month of humans

original: mi'i lo lnga na nges par brlag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi'i lo lnga na nges par brlag par 'gyur ro //
translated: or five years.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje dang / bram ze'i khye'u la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mi snang bar gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje dang / bram ze'i khye'u la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mi snang bar gyur to //
translated: The Blessed One gave his approval to Vajrapāṇi and the young brahmin, and then disappeared.

original: de nas bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i skad phyung ste /
analyzed: de nas bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i skad phyung ste /
translated: Then the young brahmin uttered the voice of Brahmā

original: rdo rje'i tshig 'di lha gnas gsum por bsgrags so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig 'di lha gnas gsum por bsgrags so //
translated: and proclaimed these vajra words in the three god realms.

original: rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī of the unobstructed subtle vajra is complete.
